fields.name: Converted from:
fields.value:
**Experiment**
*My reason tells me that land cannot be sold - nothing can be sold but
such things as can be carried away. Black Hawk, (Saulk)*
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Attack (Night) - Attack someone at night.

> Smth Else (Night) (1-use) - Attack an additional target tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Roleblock Immunity

> Control Immunity

> You clean people who you kill, hiding their will and role. You do not get this information.
